title: cpp转JS急救
content:
cpp转JS急救

本文仅讲述语法区别, 不探讨底层, 且作者才疏学浅, 难免纰漏.

cpp. JS.
auto(声明变量) var
auto(声明函数) function
const auto const
语句; ";"可有可无
数组={0} 数组=[0]
#include 没有头文件
main() 没有主函数
函数参数须指定类型 函数参数不指定类型

下文给出一个例子: 原谅我那地沟油里熬的地沟英语罢

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>

  <h1>Hello World!</h1>

  <p id="Para.1">My first para.</p>

  <button onclick="ShowDateInHTML()">
    click here to get the date in HTML
  </button>

  <button onclick="ShowDateInConsole()">
    click here to get the date in console
  </button>

  <script>
    // this is a comment.

    document.getElementById("Para.1").innerHTML 
      = "This para(#1) has been rewriten.";

    // window.alert("Warning Text Is Toasting");

    const test = 15 + "16", xyz = [67, 64, 47] 
    // test will be "1516"
    // you can't write codes like "const var"
    document.write() // there is no ";"

    function ShowDateInHTML() {
      document.write(Date());
    }
    function ShowDateInConsole() {
      console.log(Date());
    }
  </script>

</body>

</html>
